Shield.Effect: You take only 50% Pierce Damage (after subtracting Defense)
Shield.Notes:
Remember that you have to declare whether you have a Shield equipped when you start your turn!
Dual wielding Shields requires a Feat.
You can't use 2-Handed Weapons with a Shield.

Tower Shield.Notes:
Remember that you have to declare whether you have a Shield equipped when you start your turn!
Dual wielding Shields requires a Feat.
You can't use 2-Handed Weapons with a Shield.

Punch.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 4, also add your other Stat to the Damage.
Punch.Notes:
On a Critical Strike, if you used Might, you also add Dexterity to the roll (or vice-versa, if you used Dexterity, you also add Might).
If you used another Stat (certain weird Abilities do this), you add either Might or Dexterity, of choice.

Cleaver.Effect: The first Flank attack with this weapon each turn deals 1 extra Damage.

Club.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 1 or 2, the attack instantly makes the target Fumbling.

Dagger.Effect: Critical Strike - on melee attacks, if you roll 3 or more the base weapon roll, add another 1d6 Damage.
Dagger.Notes: When thrown, deals 1d6 extra Damage only if you roll 4.

Flail.Effect: You can choose to deal Smash Damage with this weapon. If you roll less than 4 on the d8, it counts as 4.

Hand Axe.Effect: Critical Strike - on melee attacks, if you rolled 11 or 12, heal for 1 health (against a Worthy Enemy).
Hand Axe.Notes: When thrown, you only get healing if you roll 12 (not on 11).

Hand Hammer.Notes: Hand Hammer attacks do not scale with any stats.

Rapier.Effect: If you decide to start your turn with the other hand empty, you have 1 extra movement Speed and you can Break your Movement.

Scimitar.Special: You are more appreciated if you pronounce it as 'Skimitar'
Scimitar.Effect: If you roll 1 on the weapon die, cancel it and roll 1d8 instead. If you roll 1 agaub, reroll as 1d10. If you roll 1 again, reroll as 1d12.

Sickle.Notes: The price is for a battle sickle. A normal peasant's sickle would be half the price, dealing 1 less damage.

Spear.Effect: Attacks with this weapon have 2 meters range.

Shortsword.Effect: Deals 1d8 instead of 1d6 Damage if you attacked with a different weapon type this turn, before this attack.
Shortsword.Alternatives: Falchion, Sabre, Scimitar variant, Arming Sword

Whip.Effect: The 1d4 becomes 1d6 Damage against unarmored or lightly armored Units.

Greatclub.Effect: Critical Strike - if all 4 rolled weapon dice are even, the target must pass a Might Check or be Stunned.
Greatclub.Notes: If by any chance this weapon rolls more than 3 dice, the Critical Strike triggers if at least 3 of the rolled weapon dice are even.

Warhammer.Effect: Your first attack with this weapon every combat ignores the target's Resistances and Defense and permanently reduces it by 1.
Warhammer.Notes: Doesn't do extra Damage if target's Defense would be less than 0.

Heavy Mace.Effect: Critical Strike - if you did maximum Damage on the base weapon roll, push the target up to 4 meters in any direction. It takes another 1d4 Smash Damage if it collides with something.

Longsword.Effect: Can be wielded either as a 1-Handed (for 1d10 + Might Damage) or 2-Handed weapon (for 1d12 + 5 + Might Damage).
Longsword.Notes: You only need to be Trained in 1-Handed or 2-Handed weapons to wield this weapon in both ways.

Greatsword.Effect: Add all 6's rolled together. They hit another Unit within 2 meters of the target for that amount.
Greatsword.Notes: Hitting another Unit with the d6's is optional.

Ultra Greatsword.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 20 on the base weapon roll, deal another 1d20 Damage.

Quarterstaff.Effect: If you are wearing no armor and wield exactly one Quarterstaff, you have +1 Defense.
Quarterstaff.Notes: A Quarterstaff is a wooden weapon masterfully crafted for physical combat, with correct weight and density and properly balanced; it's not a mage's walking stick!

Battle Axe.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 10 on at least one die, heal for the other rolled die (both from the base weapon roll) (only works against Worthy Enemies).

Scythe.Effect: You can use 1 Action to just deal 8 Damage to all Units around you (against their Defense).
Scythe.Notes: The price is for a battle scythe. A normal peasant's scythe would be half the price and can't use the special effect.

Pike.Effect: Attacks with this weapon have 2 meters range.

Halberd.Effect: Has +1d6 Damage against Large or larger enemies.

Katana.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 4 on the d4 on the base weapon roll, the attack gains +1d10 Damage.

Trident.Effect: If you moved at least 3 meters in a straight line and then attacked, the attack gains +1d4 Damage.

Pickaxe.Effect: Deals +1d6 Damage against Units wearing a shield or heavy armor (or both).

Bow.Effect: Critical Strike - deal +1d8 extra Damage if you roll 8.

Heavy Crossbow.Notes: For example, if your Movement Speed is 5 meters, you must spend 5 meters from your Movement this turn to reload the Heavy Crossbow; if you already moved, say, 2 meters, and you're left with 3 meters of Movement, you can not reload the Heavy Crossbow this turn with your Movement.

Heavy Gun.Effect: Instead of attacking, you can deal 5 Damage to all creatures in a 3x3 area in front of you.
Heavy Gun.Downside: After attacking, if you rolled at least one 1, the Heavy Gun must be reloaded with a Half-Action before using it again.
Heavy Gun.Notes: Heavy Gun attacks do not scale with any Stat. Using the special effect consumes 1 ammo.

Boomerang Blade.Effect: Critical Strike - if you roll 12, the weapon bounces to another chosen Unit within 4 meters and Damages it for 1d12 + Your Dexterity Damage (against its Defense).
Boomerang Blade.Notes: The effect applies both to throwing it and attacking with it melee. The effect applies even to the bounce attack, so it can keep bouncing as long as you keep rolling 12!

Sling.Effect: Attacks with Slings use a Third-of-an-Action (0.33 Actions).
Sling.Notes: Yes, and you can attack 3 times per turn with the same sling. Abilities that require you to make a 1-Handed weapon attack will still take a Half-Action, even if the normal Sling attack would take 0.33 Actions

Light Crossbow.Effect: You have no penalties for melee attacks with this weapon (normally, point-blank attacks have Cover) and your attacks with this weapon don't get the -2 penalty while Fumbling.

Handgun.Effect: You have no penalties for melee attacks with this weapon (normally, point-blank attacks have Cover).
Handgun.Notes: Handgun attacks do not scale with any Stat.

Blowgun.Effect: If the target has 50% Health or less, deals 1 extra Damage and the Damage Type becomes Poison.
Blowgun.Notes: The normal ammunition for this is the Regular Poison Darts (full supply). If your darts are somehow not poisoned, you don't apply the effect.
